alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hennepin and east central Carver Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rockford, or 9 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Medina around 655 PM CDT. Orono, Minnetrista and Maple Plain around 700 PM CDT. Mound around 705 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chanhassen, Victoria, Wayzata, Excelsior, Minnetonka, St. Louis Park, Hopkins, Eden Prairie and Edina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
